alert.note: Alert for Hancock (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 19 at 1:27AM CDT until September 19 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 AM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN HANCOCK...SOUTHWESTERN LEE AND EAST CENTRAL CLARK COUNTIES... At 127 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Keokuk Airport, or over Keokuk, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. This severe storm will be near... Elvaston around 140 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Sutter, Basco and Bentley. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
